DOC.HEADLINE: ALUN OWEN ; WROTE " A HARD DAY ' S NIGHT " FILM
DOC.TEXT: Alun Owen , 69 , who received an Academy Award nomination for the screenplay of the Beatles film " A Hard Day ' s Night. " The film was one of only three film credits for Owen , who was mainly a writer for television and radio . He began his career as an actor in regional repertory_companies , and had a small role in the 1959 film " I ' m All Right Jack. " On Tuesday in London .
